titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Foundation records, Pamphlet File FA1606

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-04 06:06:26 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Rockefeller Foundation maintained a vast collection of published pamphlets, academic papers, book manuscripts, magazine articles, and other booklets that reference the Foundation or members of the Rockefeller family or were created by RF officers, staff, or grantees

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Pamphlet file is arranged in 2 series. The series numbers are representative solely of when the materials were processed by RAC, and do not imply an original order of the records.
